reviews.text: I was lucky to be on the ninth floor, room 92, which was an extremely large suite with added kitchen and dining area.
reviews.title: What a nice surprise!

reviews.text: The hotel was spotless, had excellent staff and was very welcoming. I only had one evening at the hotel and was extremely glad of its comforts and service after a few days living in a ger.
reviews.title: Home from home

reviews.text: Others have said language and issue, which I agree with - but nothing was not sorted and service was always given with a smile.
reviews.title: Good value for a short stop

reviews.text: I think some rooms at lower levels may have been troubled by traffic noise - and if you have ever been to UB you can appreciate this can be an issue. The rooms on the 9th floor had bedrooms overlooking the rear that helped.
reviews.title: nice hotel, clean spacious

reviews.text: I may be back in two weeks - and have no worries about returning.
reviews.title: Nice clean and very good rooms
